name: Celebration of Closeness
description:
With the brunt of winter setting into the land, Perland hosts the Celebration of Closeness, a festival meant to share joy and warmth with your loved ones. It is a festival favored among couples and friends alike. 

This event follows two pairs who finally have the chance to spend some time together in a context that doesn't involve work. They join the festival to celebrate their affection, but things don’t quite go as planned… 

An Epic Seven fanmade visual novel lovingly created by Mel (https://twitter.com/re_uniclus) and Jabby (https://twitter.com/jabbloo) ♥️
